meanings.definition: A roughness of the skin produced by erection of its papillae, as from cold, fear, etc.
meanings.sent1: The scary movie gave me gooseflesh all over my arms.
meanings.sent2: Walking in the chilly wind caused gooseflesh to appear on her legs.
meanings.sent3: I couldn't help but laugh at the gooseflesh on my friend's neck after hearing a ghost story.
meanings.sent4: The eerie silence in the haunted house sent gooseflesh crawling up my spine.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the ghostly figure gave me gooseflesh that lasted for hours.

meanings.definition: A condition marked by the raising of bumps on the skin as a response to cold or fear.
meanings.sent1: The icy water caused gooseflesh to form on his back.
meanings.sent2: She felt gooseflesh on her arms when she heard a loud noise behind her.
meanings.sent3: The horror movie was so intense that gooseflesh covered my entire body.
meanings.sent4: The thrilling roller coaster ride gave me gooseflesh as we zoomed down the steep drop.
meanings.sent5: The unexpected jump scare in the game made gooseflesh appear on my neck.
